resources.string: server, username and password are required
Oops! The code you entered did not match. Try again!

IMPORTANT: Your client settings indicate that you were performing one-way sync for some PIM data. In the latest version of our clients, the option to choose one-way sync is no longer available and all syncs of PIM data (e.g. contacts, calendar) will be two-way only. As a precautionary measure, we have disabled sync for the data types that you were synching one-way. You may re-enable them at any time from Settings. Please note that once re-enabled, future syncs of PIM data will be two-way, affecting data both on the server and on the client. Once you have read and understood the information above, click OK to enter the client.
No WI-FI is available. To sync media over your cellular plan, click Continue. To skip media sync , click Cancel.
A sync is currently running, please wait.
The files in the folder below are synched from your phone to the server
You may import your contacts from other address book accounts listed below:
You must enter your username to send logs
The pictures in the folder below are synched from your phone to the server

Oops! Phone number is not valid. The phone number may only contain the following characters: numbers (0-9), \'.\', \'-\', \'(\', \')\', x. The username must be at least 9 characters and at most 15 characters long.
By clicking SIGN UP, I agree to the
Oops! This phone number is already used by an existing account. Choose a different username to create a new account or, if you already have an account, use your username and password to login.
Please wait until the sync has completed to change settings.
Please type the code you see below and click SIGN UP.
These settings should only be changed by Advanced users familiar with the inner workings of the application. Under normal circumstances, you would not need to change these settings.
Some changes could not be recorded correctly and will not be synchronized.
Please enable Auto-sync in \"Accounts & sync\" settings to be able to set automatic sync

Videos are downloaded to your device\'s media gallery. Videos in a format that cannot be played by your device may be played using third party media player applications. Maximum size is 100 MBs per video.
Videos are uploaded from your device\'s media gallery. Maximum size is 100 MBs per video.
Push client changes to the server
A sync is running. Please wait.

Videos are uploaded from and downloaded to your device\'s media gallery. Videos in a format that cannot be played by your device may be played using third party media player applications. Maximum size is 100 MBs per video.
There are no contacts to import.
We recommend that you import your contacts from other address book accounts listed below:
Enter your phone number and choose a password for this account.
Files are uploaded from and downloaded to the __FOLDER__ folder on your SD Card.
You have not chosen to sync any categories. Please configure the client
Do you want to save changes?
You\'re running out of space on your device. Make room on your device by removing existing media or files and then try again.
Your account information has changed. Your contacts and calendar will be replaced by ones from the new account.
There are no more address book accounts to import.
. This process may take several minutes, and can use a lot of network bandwidth. Are you sure you want to continue? (Yes in 20 seconds…)
The server has requested a full sync for
You have reached your account\'s storage limit and cannot sync more media and files.\n\nTo upgrade for more storage, login to your online account using your computer.
Pictures are downloaded to your device\'s media gallery. Pictures in a format that cannot be displayed by your device may be viewed using third party viewers.
Sorry! Signup failed. Cause unknown. Try again later.
You may use this setting to save bandwidth when synching media if you have a limited data plan.
A reset will replace all data on the client with data from the server or vice versa.

Oops! Password is not valid. The password may only contain the following characters: letters (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9) or dash. The password must be at least 4 characters and at most 16 characters long.
Import contacts from other address book accounts.
Enter your account information below and click LOGIN to sync. For notes, the free app \"OI Notepad\" is required. WARNING: This app will accept self-signed certificates from the server.
Pictures are uploaded from your device\'s media gallery.
Please enable Auto-sync in \"Accounts & sync\" settings first
There is no log data to send
Always create new contacts in the __ACCOUNT_LABEL__ address book
Pictures are uploaded from and downloaded to your device\'s media gallery. Pictures in a format that cannot be displayed by your device may be viewed using third party viewers.
Please enter all the requested information.
Uploading your older __source__ may consume lots of your online account storage. It is recommended for premium accounts only.
Sorry! Username, Password and Server Url are required. Try again!
Congratulations! You\'re now signed up and can sync! Please record your username \"__USERNAME__\" for future reference.
Please enter your username and password in the configuration.
Congratulations! You\'re signed up and can now sync. Please record your username \"__USERNAME__\" and your password \"__PASSWORD__\" for future reference.
Your signal is too weak. Please try again when your signal is stronger.
After you select a direction, you will be able to select a category.
Please contact your administrator to find out how to get an account.
Your online account can be accessed from your computer by going to __PORTAL_URL__. From your online account, you may view and manage your content or share pictures and videos with social sites.
. If you select yes, this data will be deleted on the server. Do you want to sync these deletes?
This application has detected a large number of deleted data for:
With Bandwidth Saver enabled, all automatic syncs of pictures, videos and files will be transferred over Wi-Fi only.
You may Import at any time from the Advanced tab in Settings.
Maximum size is 25 MBs per file.
More detailed logging should be used if you encounter any issues.
Your radio is disabled. Please enable your radio.
Oops! The server cannot be reached. Check the server URL is right, ensure you have sufficient network coverage and try again.
The videos in the folder below are synched from your phone to the server
No pictures are available on the phone.
Cannot import while a sync is in progress.
Powered by Funambol and PTBV Sync!
In accordance with GNU AGPL, the source code of ChBoSync is available at:
For the full text of the GNU AGPL click on the following link:
The free app \"OI Notepad\" is not installed on your device, so synchronizing of notes is not possible.
Do you want to got to install this app now?
ChBoSync is based on the PTBV SyncML client by Andreas Wolff, which in turn is based on the Funambol SyncML client. ChBoSync was released as an open source project in November 2014.
This app uses \"Joda-Time\" as external library:
Joda-Time is licenced under the \"Apache License Version 2.0\":
Your device does not support the displaying of websites in a browser.

ChBoSync cannot sync notes when the free app \"OI Notepad\" is not installed on the device. You can configure that when this app is not found on the device a button to install this app is shown instead of the sync button.
Sorry, but it seems that the appstore client required for installing new apps is not available on your device.
Do you want to open the entry for \"OI Notepad\" in the app store? After installing this app you might have to restart ChBoSync or even your device, so that \"OI Notepad\" can be recognized.
The app \"OI Notepad\" is already installed on your device.
Show button to install \"OI Notepad\" instead of sync button
Do you really want to logout? You will have to enter your credentials again to connect to the SyncML server.
create new tasks, edit existing tasks
